18245 standard concerning assignment merchant category codes retail financial services
used control usage corporate credit cards mccs assigned merchant type hotels office supply stores merchant assigned bank corporations control mccs employees corporate cards enforced authorisation system
digits length example 5967 represents inbound telemarketing merchants
mccs applied tc68 using form generally reserved merchant categories least million annual revenue
external linksedit

182452003 retail financial services merchant category codes












standards standard number




list standards romanizations standards
